title: How to See How Many Snaps You've Sent & Received on Snapchat

steps.title: Open Snapchat.
steps.content: Open Snapchat. This looks like white ghost on a yellow background. If you aren't already logged in , tap Log in to do so now. Be sure to update Snapchat.

steps.title: Tap your profile icon.
steps.content: Tap your profile icon. This will be in the top-left corner, regardless of which tab you're on. If you have a Bitmoji , you'll see your Bitmoji.

steps.title: Tap your Snapscore.
steps.content: Tap your Snapscore. This is the number underneath your Snapchat username . A pop-up menu will open.

steps.title: View your Snapscore.
steps.content: View your Snapscore. You can find your overall Snapscore at the top. [1] X Research source This number increases when you view Snaps, when your Snaps are viewed, and when you add to Stories . At the bottom, you can find the number of: Snaps sent or viewed Snaps received Snaps added to Stories
